name: Riding Solo
description:
A difficult, rage-inducing platformer!

With many different levels, you need to run, jump, flip, swing, slide, and "ride solo" to win! The levels get harder and harder, and introduce new features as you go on. 

These are all the levels we have right now, but we will continue adding more, so be on the watch for them!

Features:
  • Really Bad Homing Missiles from Robot Hitler
  • Robot Hitler (who is horrible)
  • Spinning Obstacles
  • Bounce Pads
  • Speed/Slow pads
  • Power Ups
  • Grapple Nutsack
  • Penis Homing Missiles
  • Tubes
Controls:

A - move left

D - move right

SPACE BAR - jump

LMB - click on bright cubes for grapple nuts
